title: 78: Murder Trial Date Set! Is Russell Lafitte Taking Down Others? Another Alex victim!
description:
Alex Murdaugh has been charged with murdering his wife and son. We now know when the trial is set to begin.
Alex's banker buddy, Russell Lafitte, may have recordings implicating others at his former bank.
Another alleged victim of Alex's theft of his clients settlements, comes forward and two other attorneys are mentioned in the lawsuit.
Our legal analyst, John Snyder, joins the show to break it all down.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Matt Harris and Seton Tucker
